content: > no need for circular or double-pointed needles as you knit this tri-colored hat flat and seam it up the back seaming technique video tutorial link in pdf 1 *patons yarns* patons shetland chunky 100 g/3 5 oz 136 m/148 yds 3 colors 1 ball each contrast a oxford grey 78046 contrast b steel blue 78105 contrast c soft teal 78209 sizes 5 5 mm u s 9 and 6 mm u s 10 knitting needles cable needle worked flat seam and add pom-pom to finish pom-pom diagram is provided in pdf download august 2012 *ed note may also fit teens of both sexes * video tutorial available how to seam garter stitch 2 1 http //www youtube com/watch v=sl0o_k3jyo4 2 http //www youtube com/watch v=sl0o_k3jyo4
